title: TemplateDoesNotExist at / when I run "python manage.py runserver"
body:
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

How to reproduce the problem
---------
<!-- Include the details of how the problem occurred. Which option did you choose to install doccano? Did you come across an error? What else did you try? -->
python manage.py runserver
open 127.0.0.1:8000
I see:

Request Method: | GET
-- | --
http://127.0.0.1:8000/
3.1.5
TemplateDoesNotExist
index.html
/usr/local/anaconda3/envs/docc/lib/python3.6/site-packages/django/template/loader.py, line 47, in select_template
/usr/local/anaconda3/envs/docc/bin/python3
3.6.12
['/Users/yeziyi/Desktop/gitRepository/docc/doccano/app',  '/usr/local/anaconda3/envs/docc/lib/python36.zip',  '/usr/local/anaconda3/envs/docc/lib/python3.6',  '/usr/local/anaconda3/envs/docc/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload',  '/usr/local/anaconda3/envs/docc/lib/python3.6/site-packages']
Mon, 11 Jan 2021 14:14:40 +0000
